title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Monday 3 August 2015 - BBC News
summary: four teenagers have been arrested on sus of attempted murder after a man was stabbed in the neck and chest at kettering station .
an 83-year-old moped rider has been seriously injured in a collision in woodnewton .
the jury is sent home in the trial of murder accused danny beaumont .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on tuesday .

there is
plus there plenty of roadworks across the county that might affect your journey .
keep up-to-date with the
have a good evening and we 'll see you tomorrow from 08:00 .

BBC Local Live

documents.title: four arrested on sus of attempted murder
text: four teenagers were arrested on sus of attempted murder after a man was stabbed in the neck and chest at kettering station .
those arrested were a 19-year-old and a 16-year-old from wellingborough , an 18-year-old from croydon and a 15-year-old boy from corby .
british transport police , northamptonshire police and east midlands ambulance service attended the scene on saturday .
an 18-year-old man had been stabbed and was taken to kettering hospital where he was treated for injuries to his chest and neck , and later discharged .
those arrested have been bailed until wednesday , 14 october .
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: rushden murder trial jury sent home
text: the jury has been sent home in the
the prosecution says steven smith and danny beaumont had a row that escalated into a fight that ended in mr beaumont stabbing mr smith in the chest and back , leaving him fatally wounded .
mr beaumont said he up the knife in self defence and had no intention of harming mr smith .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: wales hope north will return this month
text: wales star george north could return in their world cup warm-up in ireland on august 29 after being knocked unconscious in a collision with nathan hughes while scoring his second try in
the 23-year-old - who has scored 22 tries in 48 wales tests - had suffered three knocks to the head in six months before his layoff .
author: BBC Sport Wales

documents.title: hs2 more damaging say woodland trust
text: new research by the woodland trust shows significantly more ancient woodland is at risk of being destroyed or damaged by the proposed high speed two rail line than previously thought .
fourteen new areas have been identified by campaigners and were added to natural england 's ancient woodland inventory last month .
they include three sites in the county , mossy corner spinney near mixbury , halse copse near radstone and fox covert near whitfield , which has been
author: Annabel Amos
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: 83-year-old moped rider airlifted to hospital
text: a moped rider was seriously injured in a collision in nassington road , woodnewton , on friday , 31 july .
the collision happened at about 14:20 , near to the junction with orchard lane , when the rider of a grey honda forza , for reasons as yet unknown , came off his bike .
the moped rider , an 83-year-old man from stanford ,
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: new signing for northampton town
text: northampton town have announced the signing of midfielder paul corry on a 12 month contract .
the 24-year-old , who was on trial at the club , had been released by sheffield wednesday at the end of last season .
dubliner corry , who has been in both the republic of ireland under-21 and under-23 squads , has also had spells on loan at tranmere rovers and most recently carlisle united .
author: Joe Townsend
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: on this day in 1992 : derek redmond 's emotional olym
text: one of the iconic moments of the 1992 barcelona olym happened on this day as northampton 400m runner derek redmond 's hamstring snapped during his event , but he tried to finish the race .
half way to the finish line on one leg and crying with desperation , derek was joined by his father jim .
the moment redmond crossed the finish line brought the stadium to their feet in a standing ovation .
you can read more about it and
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

text: a new strategy for dealing with rural crime

in oundle with have a horseback special [ constable ] so we are trying to increase our presence without increasing the number of officers . ''
author: BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: kettering hospital 's memory box appeal
text: dementia nurse specialist , emma smith , said : `` we are looking for items can be anything that would spark a vivid memory .

it could be old photographs , household items , items such as shells , dolly pegs , marbles , things related to specific events or something with a look or texture that could be a conversation piece . ''
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: a43 northampton bypass set for approval
text: plans to dual a 1.5 mile ( 2.5km ) stretch of the a43 in northamptonshire could be approved tomorrow .
the county council wants to create an £ 18.75m dual carriageway on the a43 from north-east northampton via moulton .
if approved , it would form the road link for a 2,000 home development on the outskirts of northampton .
the council 's development control committee will take the final decision .
officers have recommended the proposal for approval , subject to traffic calming measures to address moulton parish council 's fears the village could become a rat-run .
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: cilla black : last surprise , surprise appearance
text: cilla black , who
their mother lillian had appeared on the original programme in 1999 - but died six weeks afterwards .
the only video-recording of the programme went missing , so jacqui wrote to surprise surprise to see if they had the recording .
they were invited back on the programme in 2013 - not only to see the original recording , but to meet with cilla again in what was to be her final ever surprise surprise .
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

text: burton latimer golfer charley hull , 19 , finished a disappointing tied 31st place in the
the winner was south korean , world number one , inbee park .
the 27-year-old shot seven birdies and an eagle during a seven-under 65 - a joint course record .

documents.title: costa customers asked to look out for missing mani
text: a woman whose seven-year-old son has vanished with her estranged husband
he is thought to be in the uk with his british father , property dealer zayn dean , 47 , also known as dholtana dad .
ms dad , 33 , said costa coffee shops were among mani 's favourite haunts .
the family lived in kettering and bedford before moving to poland .
author: Katy Prickett
BBC News

documents.title: fall in rural crime insurance claims
text: insurance company nfu mutual says that in northamptonshire the value of claims from rural crime has nearly halved from £ 880,000 last year to £ 440,000 .
that 's much better than the 15 % fall nationally .
but farmers say tractors equipment and fuel are still prime targets for thieves and northamptonshire police are today launching a new rural crime strategy .
author: BBC Radio Northampton
